p: Study conception and design of research studies: PH, YHC, CYL. Provision of patient samples and interpretation of data: CYL, YHC, CHHu. Design and performance of experiments, acquisition and analysis of data: CYL, PH, CK, CHHe. Writing and editing of manuscript: PH, CYL, CHHe, YHC, CK, CHHu, JT. PH and YHC are the guarantor of completeness of the entire study.
